跳过前2个结果，查找与小儿内科有关的疾病的信息，包括疾病的描述、预防措施、病因、: match (n1:disease)-[r1:affiliation_department]->(n2:second_level_departments)  where n2.name='小儿内科' return n1.describe, n1.prevention, n1.causes, r1.name, n1.duration_of_treatment, n1.id, n2.id, n2.name, n1.susceptible_population, n1.name, r1.type, n1.recovery_rate skip 2 limit 10

查找与呼吸内科相关的疾病id，最多返回15个结果: match (n1:disease)-[r1:affiliation_department]->(n2:second_level_departments)  where n2.name='呼吸内科' return n1.id limit 15

查找药物治疗对应的疾病恢复率、治疗类型、疾病描述和疾病id，最多返回7条结果: match (n1:disease)-[r1:treatment]->(n2:treatment_plan)  where n2.name='药物治疗' return n1.recovery_rate, r1.type, n1.describe, n1.id limit 7

返回锑末沉着症的病因: match (n1:disease)  where n1.name='锑末沉着症' return n1.causes

查找生产注射用单磷酸阿糖腺苷的厂家名称，药品id，生产关系类型，药品名称和生产关: match (n1:manufacturer)-[r1:produce_medicine]->(n2:drug)  where n2.name='注射用单磷酸阿糖腺苷' return n2.id, r1.type, n1.name, n2.name, r1.name

查找中医药物治疗的名称和id: match (n1:treatment_plan)  where n1.name='中医药物治疗' return n1.name, n1.id

查找过敏性肺炎在呼吸内科的相关信息，包括科室名称、科室ID、疾病名称、治疗周期、: match (n1:disease)-[r1:affiliation_department]->(n2:second_level_departments)  where n1.name='过敏性肺炎' and n2.name='呼吸内科' return n2.name, n2.id, n1.name, n1.duration_of_treatment, n1.recovery_rate, r1.name, n1.prevention, n1.susceptible_population, n1.id, r1.type, n1.causes order by n2.name

查找口腔科所属的一级部门名称，关系类型和关系名称，并按口腔科名称排序: match (n1:second_level_departments)-[r1:belong_to]->(n2:first_level_departments)  where n1.name='口腔科' return n1.name, r1.type, r1.name order by n1.name

查找耳鼻喉科的id，最多返回10个结果: match (n1:second_level_departments)  where n1.name='耳鼻喉科' return n1.id limit 10

查找不动纤毛综合征的预防措施、易感人群、症状id、病因、疾病名称、疾病描述、疾病: match (n1:disease)-[r1:with_symptoms]->(n2:symptoms)  where n1.name='不动纤毛综合征' return n1.prevention, n1.susceptible_population, n2.id, n1.causes, n1.name, n1.describe, n1.id, r1.type

查找萆薢分清丸的名称和id，并按名称排序: match (n1:drug)  where n1.name='萆薢分清丸' return n1.name, n1.id order by n1.name

查找名称为额横纹增深的症状的名称和id，并按名称排序: match (n1:symptoms)  where n1.name='额横纹增深' return n1.name, n1.id order by n1.name

查找名称为头痛且其高度推荐药物为清凉油的疾病id: match (n1:disease)-[r1:highly_rated_medicines]->(n2:drug)  where n1.name='头痛' and n2.name='清凉油' return n1.id

查找药物治疗方案对应的吸入性损伤的名称、易感人群、治疗类型、恢复率以及治疗方案的: match (n1:disease)-[r1:treatment]->(n2:treatment_plan)  where n2.name='药物治疗' and n1.name='吸入性损伤' return n2.name, n1.name, n1.susceptible_population, r1.type, n1.recovery_rate, n2.id

查找虾仁的id和名称: match (n1:food)  where n1.name='虾仁' return n1.id, n1.name

查找乙型病毒性肝炎的治疗周期、名称、描述以及推荐食谱的类型和疾病id: match (n1:disease)-[r1:recommended_recipes]->(n2:recipe)  where n1.name='乙型病毒性肝炎' return n1.duration_of_treatment, n1.name, n1.describe, r1.type, n1.id

查找导致呼吸衰竭的疾病的预防措施、易感人群、治疗周期、病因、疾病描述、恢复率、疾: match (n1:disease)-[r1:complication]->(n2:disease)  where n2.name='呼吸衰竭' return n1.prevention, n2.prevention, n1.susceptible_population, n1.duration_of_treatment, n1.causes, n2.describe, n1.id, n2.susceptible_population, n1.describe, n1.recovery_rate, r1.type, n1.name, r1.name, n2.id

查找悦康药业生产的注射用胸腺五肽的id、药品名称、生产关系类型、生产关系名称以及: match (n1:manufacturer)-[r1:produce_medicine]->(n2:drug)  where n1.name='悦康药业' and n2.name='注射用胸腺五肽' return n2.id, n1.id, n2.name, r1.type, r1.name, n1.name

查找太田痣的病因、id、名称和描述: match (n1:disease)-[r1:recommended_recipes]->(n2:recipe)  where n1.name='太田痣' return n1.causes, n1.id, n1.name, n1.describe

查找髌骨劳损的名称和id: match (n1:symptoms)  where n1.name='髌骨劳损' return n1.name, n1.id

查找枕骨下硬结性毛囊炎的病因、治疗周期、疾病描述、易感人群、预防措施、疾病名称、: match (n1:disease)  where n1.name='枕骨下硬结性毛囊炎' return n1.causes, n1.duration_of_treatment, n1.describe, n1.susceptible_population, n1.prevention, n1.name, n1.id, n1.recovery_rate order by n1.name

查找名为下腹局部疼痛的症状名称: match (n1:symptoms)  where n1.name='下腹局部疼痛' return n1.name

查找适合吃小白菜的疾病名称、关系类型、疾病的预防方法、疾病描述、疾病id、食物名: match (n1:disease)-[r1:suitable_to_eat]->(n2:food)  where n2.name='小白菜' return n1.name, r1.type, n1.prevention, n1.describe, n1.id, n2.name, r1.name, n1.causes, n1.susceptible_population, n1.recovery_rate

查找清肺散结丸的名称和id: match (n1:drug)  where n1.name='清肺散结丸' return n1.name, n1.id
